items.text_for_match: Who decides the winner of the Ballon d'Or? BBC Sport's digital presenter Sam Harris explains the process behind the Ballon d'Or vote. BBC Sport's digital presenter Sam Harris explains the process behind the Ballon d'Or vote.

items.ja: 'It's a tough day' - Williams and Scott pay tribute to Beard
items.en: 'It's a tough day' - Williams and Scott pay tribute to Beard
items.text_for_match: 'It's a tough day' - Williams and Scott pay tribute to Beard Fara Williams, who was part of Matt Beard's Liverpool side that won back-to-back Women's Super League titles, pays tribute to the former Liverpool manager after his death aged 47. items.ja: 'There's no one else who would do that' - Walcott on Martinelli
items.en: 'There's no one else who would do that' - Walcott on Martinelli
items.text_for_match: 'There's no one else who would do that' - Walcott on Martinelli Match of the Day's Theo Walcott looks at Gabriel Martinelli's attitude coming off the bench to score a late equaliser for Arsenal in their 1-1 draw against Man City in the Premier League. items.ja: How Man City's low block came unstuck
items.en: How Man City's low block came unstuck
items.text_for_match: How Man City's low block came unstuck Match of the Day's Shay Given analyses how Man City's resolute low block was undone by a sloppy counter attack and some bad positioning from Gigi Donnarumma, allowing Arsenal score a late equaliser in their 1-1 draw on Sunday. items.ja: Why Arsenal and Man City are bringing back long-ball football
items.en: Why Arsenal and Man City are bringing back long-ball football
items.text_for_match: Why Arsenal and Man City are bringing back long-ball football Arsenal and Manchester City have been known for their intricate football, so why are they now starting to go long more often? items.ja: 'It's not good' - Howe on toothless Newcastle attack
items.en: 'It's not good' - Howe on toothless Newcastle attack
items.text_for_match: 'It's not good' - Howe on toothless Newcastle attack Newcastle United boss Eddie Howe says his team are "evolving and changing in attacking" after logging a third goalless draw  of the season. items.ja: Wolves remain winless as Leeds come from behind to secure victory
items.en: Wolves remain winless as Leeds come from behind to secure victory
items.text_for_match: Wolves remain winless as Leeds come from behind to secure victory Wolves stay bottom of the Premier League and remain without a win from their first five matches after losing 3-1 at home to Leeds, despite taking an early lead at Molineux. items.ja: Man Utd get crucial win over Chelsea after early Sanchez red card
items.en: Man Utd get crucial win over Chelsea after early Sanchez red card
items.text_for_match: Man Utd get crucial win over Chelsea after early Sanchez red card Manchester United hung on for a crucial win against Chelsea in the Premier League, in a frantic match that saw two red cards and three goals, all in torrential rain at Old Trafford. items.ja: Liverpool maintain perfect start after edging past rivals Everton
items.en: Liverpool maintain perfect start after edging past rivals Everton
items.text_for_match: Liverpool maintain perfect start after edging past rivals Everton  Goals from Ryan Gravenberch and Hugo Ekitike guided Liverpool to a 2-1 win against rivals Everton to maintain their perfect start in the Premier League with Arne Slot's side having now won their first five league matches this season. items.ja: Potter under pressure as West Ham beaten at home by Crystal Palace
items.en: Potter under pressure as West Ham beaten at home by Crystal Palace
items.text_for_match: Potter under pressure as West Ham beaten at home by Crystal Palace  Pressure continues to mount on West Ham manager Graham Potter as he sees his side fall to a fourth Premier League defeat of the season, losing 2-1 at home to Crystal Palace. items.text_for_match: Postecoglou's wait for first Forest win goes on after draw at Burnley  Ange Postecoglou's wait for a first Nottingham Forest win goes on after his side were held to a 1-1 draw at Burnley in the Premier League.
